turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! Would you be able to order me a coffee before our meeting this afternoon?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! Which Starbucks - the usual?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the one on Pennsylvania Ave North West in D.C.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll place the order now - what drink do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande caffe mocha please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hot or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about milk? Any type?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nonfat milk for sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to add an espresso shot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add two shots - I'm so exhausted today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sounds good. So you want a grande hot caffe mocha with nonfat milk and whipped cream, along with two espresso shots - is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's it! Go ahead and place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, perfect - just placed the order and it's confirmed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When can I pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It says it will be ready soon and your receipt should be sent to your phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome - just got the receipt. Will go pick it up now. Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Talk to you later.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye!
